name: Combination Pro Soccer: J.League no Kantoku ni Natte Sekai o Mezase!
overview: Combination Pro Soccer is a soccer manager game endorsed by the J.League in which you can decide the training sessions of each player and them watch the match in a beatiful 3d engine. The game features cartoon graphics and a lot of options in the tactics and training for the player to choose the ones that the player decides. The goal of the game is to be the best soccer manager of Japan and can also become the Japanese national team coach. The game features also a VS Mode in which the players have to use the teams that they had trained during the main game.
